Actions.ActionName: Set the display name of the macro
Set the updated download's base filename
Get the latest version number from the server
To avoid cache, get an ever-changing number—the time

ElseActions.ActionName: Version is current; notify user if manually run

ConditionList.TextValue: Editor|Hot Key Trigger|Global Macro Palette Trigger|Status Menu Trigger|Typed String Trigger

ThenActions.Title: %Variable%localMacroActualName%
ThenActions.ActionName: Notify use that they have the current version
ThenActions.Subtitle: Update check: You're current

ThenActions.ActionName: Not needed now, but might be useful someday.

Actions.ActionName: Grab the latest release notes to a local temporary file
Display the release notes in a floating window

ThenActions.ActionName: Build a URL with the timestamp to avoid server cache
Display the release notes from the online file

ThenActions.Title: There's an updated %Variable%localMacroActualName% macro available…
ThenActions.Prompt:
You are using version %CalculateFormat%instanceCurrentVersion%##0.0%; %CalculateFormat%instanceLatestVersion%##0.0% is current.
Download the new version?

Actions.ActionName: Download the URL, confirm it worked
Open the URL that redirects to the latest version download

Actions.Title: Confirm the file downloaded…
Actions.Prompt:
Your Downloads folder should have a file whose name begins with "%Variable%instanceMacroName%." If it's there, click OK to begin the verification process.

If it's not there, you can try again later. If it never shows up, please contact me and we'll figure it out. https://robservatory.com/contact-rob/

Actions.ActionName: Disable the macro so we don't check again

Actions.Title: How to see updates again...
